Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Nasa Vegas Hotel in Bangkok (Ratchadaphisek - Rama 9), you'll be convenient to Mall Ramkhamhaeng and The Mall Bangkapi. This hotel is within close proximity of Bangkok Hospital and J Avenue Thonglor.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 494 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and in-room massages.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a health club, or other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge) and a hair salon.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Nasa Vegas Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Bangkok? This hotel has facilities measuring 30 square feet (3 square meters), including a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and extended parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Nasa Vegas Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and in-room massages.

With a stay at Nasa Vegas Hotel in Bangkok (Ratchadaphisek - Rama 9), you'll be convenient to Mall Ramkhamhaeng and The Mall Bangkapi. This hotel is within close proximity of Bangkok Hospital and J Avenue Thonglor.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Mall Ramkhamhaeng - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
The Mall Bangkapi - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Bangkok Hospital - 2 km / 1.3 mi
J Avenue Thonglor - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Ramkhamhaeng University - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Nine Center Rama 9 - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Rajamangala Stadium - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Gateway Ekamai Mall - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Siam Niramit Bangkok - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi
Emporium Shopping Complex - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Benjasiri Park - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Bangkok University - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Samitivej Srinakarin Hospital - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Embassy of India - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Tesco Lotus Sukhumvit 50 - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
Bangkok (BKK-Suvarnabhumi Intl.) - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi
Bangkok (DMK-Don Mueang Intl.) - 19.7 km / 12.2 mi

The preferred airport for Nasa Vegas Hotel is Bangkok (BKK-Suvarnabhumi Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
